title: NWChem Total Energy Context Provider Schema
description: Schema for NWChemTotalEnergyContextProvider that generates context data for NWChem total energy input.

BASIS.description: Basis set label used in the calculation (e.g., '6-31G').

NAT.description: Number of atoms in the system.

NTYP.description: Number of unique atomic species in the system.

ATOMIC_POSITIONS.description: Formatted text block with atomic positions including constraints.

ATOMIC_POSITIONS_WITHOUT_CONSTRAINTS.description: Formatted text block with atomic positions without constraints.

ATOMIC_SPECIES.description: Formatted text block for atomic species, including element symbols and masses.

CARTESIAN.description: Whether atomic positions are expressed in cartesian coordinates.
